summary: First her father ends up in one of Stalin's prison camps, then young Svetlana herself experiences the German invasion. In order to survive she learns German at home in Kiev. She is good and... See full summary »
cast: Svetlana Geier|Anna Götte|Hannelore Hagen|Jürgen Klodt|Johannes Geier|Fyodor Ivanovich Mikhaylov|Sofiya Nikolaevna Mikhaylova
title: Die Frau mit den 5 Elefanten
